locations.name: Catalina's Bedroom
locations.description: Modest Colombian family home bedroom with personal touches. Single bed with colorful floral comforter (typical Colombian pattern with bright yellows, pinks, blues). Small wooden nightstand with family photo, bedside lamp, and smartphone. Wooden armario (closet) with full-length mirror on door. Small wooden dresser with hair products and accessories. Tile flooring (typical Colombian homes). Walls painted warm cream color. Light blue curtains on window. Poster of Colombian singer on wall. Small desk with university textbooks and closed laptop in corner, mochila hanging on chair.

locations.name: Catalina's Family Bathroom
locations.description: Shared family bathroom in Colombian home. Blue and white tile design on walls and floor (traditional Colombian style). Single vanity with white sink and chrome faucet. Large mirror above sink with bright fluorescent vanity lighting. Shower area with plastic floral-patterned curtain. Colorful woven bath mat (traditional Colombian textile). Towel rack with colorful towels. Small shelf with family toiletries — multiple toothbrushes in holder (pink, blue, green, yellow), Colgate toothpaste, soap, hair products. Window with frosted glass. Clean and well-organized shared space.

locations.name: Catalina's Family Kitchen
locations.description: Heart of Colombian family home. Warm space with cream-colored walls and colorful ceramic tile backsplash (traditional Colombian pattern with bright colors). Wooden cabinets with simple hardware. Gas stove (estufa de gas) typical of Colombian homes. Standard refrigerator (nevera). Wooden dining table with checkered tablecloth, seating for family of four. Simple wooden chairs. Large window with rooster-pattern curtains letting in morning light. Chrome sink. Counter space with cooking essentials. Large coffee thermos in center of table. Colorful plates and glasses.
